room_title: Escape room "Pirate's Curse" by St. Louis Escape in St. Louis
review: We enjoyed our experience. The room we did was great adults and a group of teenage girls. Staff was great and helpful. We Will return to to another room.

room_title: Escape room "Pirate's Curse" by St. Louis Escape in St. Louis
review: Such a fun thing to do for a bachelorette party. The staff was so friendly and gave us more than enough clues to help us escape. This is by far the best escape room Iâ€™ve ever been to.

room_title: Escape room "Pirate's Curse" by St. Louis Escape in St. Louis
review: What a cool venue! This was such a neat experience. The props in the Pirates Curse room(s) were top of the line. This was the 3rd room I've been to, and by far my favorite! My heart was racing the last couple minutes while we scrambled to try to get out. We made it with just 3 minutes to spare. I would highly recommend this place and we definitely want to check out the other rooms when we visit St. Louis next time. The signs and the props at the end were fun to take our victory picture with!
